extDesc.message: Adds a twisty to the headers, limits displayed headers to 1 or 2 lines

singleLineTooltip.message: Displays compact headers on a single line

moveToHeaderTooltip.message: Shows the To header on the first line in double line mode

moveCcHeaderTooltip.message: Shows the Cc header on the first line in double line mode

moveContentBaseheaderTooltip.message: Shows the Website from RSS messages on the first line in double line mode

fullSubjectTooltip.message: Do not truncate Subject header in double line mode

moveTagsTooltip.message: Show message Tags on the second line in double line mode
